import React from 'react' export default function UpdateModal(props) { function handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault() add(taskDescription, dueDate) getTasks(); setTaskDescription(''); setDueDate('') } function onChange(e) { if (e.target.name === 'dueDate') { setDueDate(new Date(e.target.value).toLocaleDateString()) } else { setTaskDescription(e.target.value) } } return (

Modal title

) }
